programme.title: The Devil Horse
programme.desc: After his family is wiped out by an ambush, a young boy is captured by Native Americans, and befriends a colt during his captivity.

programme.title: The Fighting Redhead
programme.desc: Red Ryder helps his old friend Dan O'Connor in his fight against Faro Savage and his gang of rustlers.

programme.title: The Gunman From Bodie
programme.desc: The Rough Riders (Buck Jones, Tim McCoy, Raymond Hatton) act like strangers to catch a crooked lawyer.

programme.title: The Red Rope
programme.desc: Ranch hand Tom Shaw (Bob Steele) must face off against a nefarious gunslinger to save his lady love's ranch..

programme.title: Springtime in the Sierras
programme.desc: A gang of poachers must be stopped as they kill and sell game out of season. Roy figures out who the culprits are and goes undercover to investigate further.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: An outlaw keeps his convict brother from going straight.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie (Gail Davis) has hopes of acquiring a prime piece of land in a newly opened territory. With Douglas Kennedy, James Griffith.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie (Gail Davis) becomes involved in a controversy between a teen (Carolyn Craig) and her overly possessive father (Ewing Mitchell).

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie (Gail Davis) and Lofty (Brad Johnson) try to discover the identity of a masked man known as the Robin Hood Kid (Tyler MacDuff).

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie (Gail Davis) and Lofty (Brad Johnson) step in when a young cavalry officer (Harry Lauter) is framed for murder.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Lofty (Brad Johnson) faces a moral dilemma when confronted with a notorious outlaw who once saved his life. With Lane Bradford, Bill Henry.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: A notorious outlaw arrives during an election to shed a bad light on his brother, an honest lawyer running for office.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: The son (Stuffy Singer) of a slain deputy has suspicions about his caregiver (Leonard Penn), a reformed outlaw.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie, Lofty and Tagg (Gail Davis, Brad Johnson, Jimmy Hawkins) attend a friend's wedding and investigate the best man's murder.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie (Gail Davis) uncovers a scheme involving honest ranchers, a band of greedy crooks and a valuable oil pool. With Monte Blue, Jim Bannon.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: A contractor agrees to deliver government gun-powder to Geronimo.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie's childhood sweetheart has become an outlaw, the Waco Kid.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A stageline driver is framed in the looting of strongboxes by the stageline owner and freighter.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: After a woman is wrongfully jailed, Cisco and Pancho plan to trap the real murderer.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho prove that an office manager and his followers are murderers.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A gambler's thugs beat up a crusading newspaperman.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A dog leads Cisco and Pancho to his murdered master's gold mine where they become trapped by the victim's killers.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco proves that the man being held in jail on a murder charge is not the actual murderer.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A respectable businessman traps an elderly man into a rustling ring scheme that Pancho and Cisco later discover.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho set out to prove that a notorious outlaw has murdered a U.S. marshal.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho capture a notorious bank robber after falling for a trap set by the criminal's sister.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho attempt to convince a freighting company owner that her competitor did not steal from her wagons.

programme.title: Cry Blood, Apache
programme.desc: An old man (Joel McCrea) recalls his days as a young man (Jody McCrea) fighting Indians in the Old West.

programme.title: McLintock!
programme.desc: A cattle baron (John Wayne) tries to tame his wife (Maureen O'Hara) amid a feud with settlers and trouble with Indians.

programme.title: The Painted Desert
programme.desc: A tungsten miner (Bill Boyd) loves his father's rival's daughter (Helen Twelvetrees) and fights off her other suitor (Clark Gable).

programme.title: Hoppy Serves a Writ
programme.desc: Hopalong Cassidy (William Boyd) and his sidekicks (Andy Clyde, Jay Kirby) lure outlaws out of Oklahoma to justice in Texas.

programme.title: The Drifter
programme.desc: A woodsman finds himself involved in the love affair between his brother and the daughter of the lumber boss.
